C

cmd.parser - package cmd.parser
The cmd.parser package provides classes and utilities for parsing command-line arguments and generating help messages for specified options.
CommandLineParser - Class in cmd.parser
The CommandLineParser class provides methods to parse command-line arguments and generate help messages for specified options.

G

Returns the help message as a string for the specified options.

Returns the long argument name of this option.

N

NO_ARGUMENT - Enum constant in enum class cmd.parser.OptionType
Indicates that the option does not accept any arguments.

O

Option - Class in cmd.parser
The Option class represents a command-line option with both long and short argument names.
OPTIONAL_ONE_ARGUMENT - Enum constant in enum class cmd.parser.OptionType
Indicates that the option accepts an optional argument.
OPTIONAL_ONE_OR_MORE_ARGUMENTS - Enum constant in enum class cmd.parser.OptionType
Indicates that the option accepts no argument or multiple arguments.
OptionBuilder - Class in cmd.parser
The OptionBuilder class provides a builder for constructing Option objects.
OptionBuilder(OptionType, String) - Constructor for class cmd.parser.OptionBuilder
Constructs an OptionBuilder with the specified option type and short argument name.
OptionType - Enum Class in cmd.parser
Enum representing the types of arguments that an option can have.
Overview - Search tag in package cmd.parser

P

parse(String[], Option[]) - Static method in class cmd.parser.CommandLineParser
Parses the command-line arguments and returns a map of options mapped to the long argument version.

R

REQUIRES_ONE_OR_MORE_ARGUMENTS - Enum constant in enum class cmd.parser.OptionType
